title: Full Show (Brady & Gronk almost joined the Raiders in 2020, KaVontae Turpin's two TD returns, Chet Holmgren vs. LeBron)
description:
Listen to the Skip Bayless Show: https://listen.foxaud.io/SkipBaylessShow?sid=und
00:00 Brady & Gronk were close to joining the Raiders in 2020
23:22 KaVontae Turpin’s two preseason TD kick returns
38:44 Chet Holmgren vs. LeBron
51:43 Dak ranked 44th on NFL’s Top 100 Players of 2022
1:04:55 KD & Kyrie latest
1:17:35 Leon Edwards knocks out Kamaru Usman in UFC 278
1:26:20 LeBron’s extension
1:35:58 Zeke’s commercial with Kevin Hart and Lamar Jackson
1:39:40 Udonis Haslem announces his return for 20th season with the Heat
